markdownRemark.html:
Here’s an amazing video showcasing the first 10 startups in the BCF Imagine program. And yes, Scenarex is part of it! BCF Avocats d’affaires is a lot more than lawyers.

A special thank you to Brigitte Nepveu, Jocelyn Auger and Julien Lacheré who have been helping us in our adventure.

https://www.facebook.com/BCFimagine/videos/462688940791456/

frontmatter.title: Scenarex is selected to be part of the first startup group of BCF Imagine
frontmatter.author: Simon-Pierre Marion
